title: 2015_7 Complex Indeed! -part 2
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n+1 }{ { \left\{ \sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ \sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -i\cos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  }  \right\}  }^{ m } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i=\sqrt { -1 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What can we describe for the expression above?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"More question?!","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n+1 }{ { \left\{ \sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -icos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  }  \right\}  }^{ m } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Evaluating "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -icos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ (-i)\left\{ cos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) +isin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=(-i)\sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ { e }^{ \frac { 2\pi k }{ m }  } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=(-i)\sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ { \alpha  }^{ k } } \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad ,where\quad \alpha ={ e }^{ \frac { 2\pi  }{ m }  }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=(-i)\frac { \alpha ({ \alpha  }^{ m-1 }-1) }{ (\alpha -1) } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow \sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -icos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  } =i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n+1 }{ { \left\{ \sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -icos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  }  \right\}  }^{ m } } =\sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n+1 }{ { i }^{ m } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow \sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n+1 }{ { \left\{ \sum _{ k=1 }^{ m-1 }{ \left\{ sin\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right) -icos\left( \frac { 2k\pi  }{ m }  \right)  \right\}  }  \right\}  }^{ m } } =i=\boxed { purely\quad imaginary } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{ m=1 }^{ 4n }{ { i }^{ m } } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is always equal to zero. You can check it yourselves!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: #2015_8 I know that you know it

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Write the equation "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"({ x }^{ 2 }+1)({ y }^{ 2 }+1)+2(x-y)(1-xy)=4(1+xy)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the form,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ x }^{ 2 }{ y }^{ 2 }+{ y }^{ 2 }+{ x }^{ 2 }+1+2(x-y)(1-xy)=4+4xy"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow { x }^{ 2 }{ y }^{ 2 }-2xy+1+{ y }^{ 2 }+{ x }^{ 2 }-2xy+2(x-y)(1-xy)=4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow { (xy-1) }^{ 2 }+({ x-y })^{ 2 }-2(x-y)(xy-1)=4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow { [xy-1-(x-y) }]^{ 2 }=4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow { xy-1-(x-y) }=\pm 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"\"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow (x+1)(y-1)=\pm 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CASE I: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x+1)(y-1)=2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we obtain system of equations,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{Bmatrix} x+1=2 \\ y-1=1 \end{Bmatrix} \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=-2 \\ y-1=-1 \end{Bmatrix} \\ \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=1 \\ y-1=2 \end{Bmatrix}\quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=-1 \\ y-1=-2 \end{Bmatrix} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"yielding solutions "},{"type":"text","text":"(1,2),(-3,0),(0,3),(-2,-1)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CASE II:"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x+1)(y-1)=-2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we obtain system of equations,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{Bmatrix} x+1=2 \\ y-1=-1 \end{Bmatrix} \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad\begin{Bmatrix} x+1=-2 \\ y-1=1 \end{Bmatrix} \\ \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=1 \\ y-1=-2 \end{Bmatrix} \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=-1 \\ y-1=2 \end{Bmatrix} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"yielding solutions "},{"type":"text","text":"(1,0),(-3,2),(0,-1),(-2,3)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{8}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" integral solutions."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=2 \\ y-1=1 \end{Bmatrix}  \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad  \begin{Bmatrix} x+1=-2 \\ y-1=-1 \end{Bmatrix}  \\ \begin{bmatrix} x+1=1 \\ y-1=2 \end{bmatrix}  \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad  \begin{bmatrix} x+1=-1 \\ y-1=-2 \end{bmatrix}  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Don't use \left { and \right in the code for matrixs. Use {bmatrix} for square brackets and {Bmatrix} for curly brackets."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I can't edit your Latex since I'm not a mod. So to fix your code, delete all "\left {" and "\right". You can put the brackets you want by adding a "b" or "B" to {matrix} (both begin and end).

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: #2015_9 This is time for JEE Advanced..
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sum to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(n+1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" terms of the series,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac { { C }_{ 0 } }{ 2 } -\frac { { C }_{ 1 } }{ 3 } +\frac { { C }_{ 2 } }{ 4 } -\frac { { C }_{ 3 } }{ 5 } +..."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note: Cr=(nr){ C }_{ r }=\left( \begin{matrix} n \\ r \end{matrix} \right) Cr​=(nr​)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"More questions??","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We have 
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ (1-x) }^{ n }={ C }_{ 0 }-{ C }_{ 1 }x+{ C }_{ 2 }{ x }^{ 2 }-{ C }_{ 3 }{ x }^{ 3 }+....."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow x{ (1-x) }^{ n }={ C }_{ 0 }x-{ C }_{ 1 }{ x }^{ 2 }+{ C }_{ 2 }{ x }^{ 3 }-{ C }_{ 3 }{ x }^{ 4 }+....."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow \int _{ 0 }^{ 1 }{ x{ (1-x) }^{ n } } dx=\int _{ 0 }^{ 1 }{ ( } { C }_{ 0 }x-{ C }_{ 1 }{ x }^{ 2 }+{ C }_{ 2 }{ x }^{ 3 }-{ C }_{ 3 }{ x }^{ 4 }+.....)dx\quad \quad \quad ----(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"LHS","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ="},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\int _{ 0 }^{ 1 }{ x{ (1-x) }^{ n } } dx=\frac { 1 }{ (n+1)(n+2) } { \quad \quad \quad \left[ \because \int _{ 0 }^{ a }{ f\left( x \right) dx=\int _{ 0 }^{ a }{ f\left( a-x \right)  } dx= } \left( \frac { { x }^{ n+1 } }{ n+1 } -\frac { { x }^{ n+2 } }{ n+2 }  \right)  \right]  }_{ 0 }^{ 1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"RHS","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ \left[ \frac { { C }_{ 0 }{ x }^{ 2 } }{ 2 } -\frac { { C }_{ 1 }{ x }^{ 3 } }{ 3 } +\frac { { C }_{ 2 }{ x }^{ 4 } }{ 4 } -.... \right]  }_{ 0 }^{ 1 }=\frac { { C }_{ 0 } }{ 2 } -\frac { { C }_{ 1 } }{ 3 } +\frac { { C }_{ 2 } }{ 4 } -....."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac { { C }_{ 0 } }{ 2 } -\frac { { C }_{ 1 } }{ 3 } +\frac { { C }_{ 2 } }{ 4 } -\frac { { C }_{ 3 } }{ 5 } +..."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\boxed{ \frac { 1 }{ (n+1)(n+2) }} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: This year again

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{2015}{5}=403"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so as minimum you can use "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"403"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" digits five for complete the sum."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now, in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{2015}{5}=403"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" digits five "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\therefore"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as maximum we can remove "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015-403=\boxed{1612}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" digits."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

title: 2015 again
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be a non-real number that satisfy the equation "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{4}=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\displaystyle \\sum_{n=0}^{2015} \\left (x^{n}+\\frac{1}{x^{n}} \\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            When "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^n = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{n-1} + x^{n-2}+...+x^2+x+1 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Consider the following:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} x^3+x^2+x+1 & = 0 & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Multiplying both sides by }x \\ x^4+x^3+x^2+x & = 0 & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Adding both sides by }1 \\ x^4+\color{#3D99F6}x^3+x^2+x + 1 & = 1 & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Note that } x^3+x^2+x+1 = 0 \\ x^4 + \color{#3D99F6} 0 & = 1 \\ \implies x^4 & = 1 \end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            how do you say x^3....+1 equals zero

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We have that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{4} - 1 = (x^{2} - 1)(x^{2} + 1) = (x - 1)(x + 1)(x + i)(x - i)."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the roots distinct from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\pm 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\pm i."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Now "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^{n} = i^{n+4}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(-i)^{n} = (-i)^{n+4},"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so for each of these values we have that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle\sum_{n=0}^{2015} \left(x^{n} + \dfrac{1}{x^{n}}\right) = 504 \sum_{n=0}^{3} \left(x^{n} + \dfrac{1}{x^{n}}\right),"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"since the given sum has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016 = 4*504"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" terms, and thus "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"504"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "cycles" of the same sum. Now"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle\sum_{n=0}^{3} \left(i^{n} + \dfrac{1}{i^{n}}\right) ="}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left(1 + \dfrac{1}{1}\right) + \left(i + \dfrac{1}{i}\right) + \left(-1 + \dfrac{1}{-1}\right) + \left(-i + \dfrac{1}{-i}\right) ="}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2 + \dfrac{i^{2} + 1}{i} + (-2) + \dfrac{i^{2} + 1}{-i} = 0."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Similarly for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = -i."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Thus the original sum is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{0}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as well."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=e^{i\theta}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^4=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"e^{4i\theta}=e^{2ik\pi}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\theta=\frac{k\pi}{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By De Movire's Theorem, 
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{n}+x^{-n}=e^{\frac{ink\pi}{2}} +e^{\frac{-ink\pi}{2}}=2\cos{\frac{nk\pi}{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The sum thus reduces to"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2\sum_{n=0}^{2015}\cos{\frac{nk\pi}{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Notice that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\cos{\frac{0\pi}{2}}+\cos{\frac{\pi}{2}}+\cos{\frac{2\pi}{2}}+\cos{\frac{3\pi}{2}}=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The cosine function is periodic, with a period of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\pi"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , hence we have 503 "cycles" of the same sum of zero, since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015= 4(503)+3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2\sum_{n=0}^{2015}\cos{\frac{nk\pi}{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2[503×0+\cos{\frac{0\pi}{2}}+\cos{\frac{\pi}{2}}+\cos{\frac{2\pi}{2}}]"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=2(0+1+0-1)=\boxed{0}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2015 AIME I Problem 2
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The nine delegates to the Economic Cooperation Conference include "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" officials from Mexico, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" officials from Canada, and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" officials from the United States. During the opening session, three of the delegates fall asleep. Assuming that the three sleepers were determined randomly, the probability that exactly two of the sleepers are from the same country is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\frac{m}{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are relatively prime positive integers. Find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We first count the total numer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"T"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of combinations"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"T=\binom{9}{3}=84"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"And the number "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"F"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of favorable cases, counting the number of ways we can choose "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" delegates from a country and multiplying it by the number of ways we can choose the third one from another country"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mexico: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"F_M=\binom{2}{2}\cdot(9-2)=7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Canada: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"F_C=\binom{3}{2}\cdot(9-3)=18"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"United States: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"F_{US}=\binom{4}{2}\cdot(9-4)=30"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Longrightarrow F=7+18+30=55"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore the probability is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P=\dfrac{F}{T}=\dfrac{55}{84}=\dfrac{m}{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Longrightarrow m+n=55+84=\boxed{139}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We count the number of ways that there are NOT exactly two sleepers from the same country. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The first way is to have 1 sleeper from each country. There are 2 people to choose from for MX, 3 from Canada, and 4 from US, so there are 2"},{"type":"text","text":"3","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":"4=24 ways to do this. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The last way is to have 3 sleepers from 1 country. This is not possible for MX, there's only 1 way to do this for Canada, and there are 4 ways to do this for US (there are four people total and we need to pick three, so there are four choices for who to leave out). "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now, let's count up the total number of ways to pick sleepers. We have to choose 3 people from a total of 9, which works out to 9!/(3!6!) = 84. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lastly, there were 29 ways to not have exactly two people from one country, and 84 possibilities total, so there are 55 ways to have exactly two people from one country. So, the probability is 55/84, and 55+84=139."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2015 and 2018
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"what is the sum of the digits of the product "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" multiplied by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^{2018}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}

title: 2015 and aliens (and pigeons)
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/7hxZhLVusa-squeeze-toy-aliens.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A group of aliens come to visit the world, threatening the mankind. They said they need "},{"type":"text","text":"a group of 2015 people who were born exactly on the same minute in 2015","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":". If people cannot find the group, then the world will be devastated completely.  You, as the brave, want to rescue the world so you made the choice of which country you should search for the best strategy."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The country must surely have the group of people the aliens requested, and should have the least people possible to be easy to control the search."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The data below shows suitable country for the search and its estimated population in 2015:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"China","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" - 1,372,560,000"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"United States","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" - 322,001,000"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Japan","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" - 126,832,000"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thailand","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" - 65,104,000"}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Australia","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" - 23,924,700"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Which of the following is the best country that fits the given condition?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem can be solved using "},{"type":"text","text":"Pigeonhole Principle","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{k = \bigg\lfloor\dfrac{n-1}{m}\bigg\rfloor + 1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"60"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" minutes in an hour. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"24"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" hours in a day. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"365"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" days in 2015. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
The total of different times people were born is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"60\times24\times365 = 525,600."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
We need to be sure that 2015 people will share the same minute of birth this year. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
From the above, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k = 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m = 525,600."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015 = \bigg\lfloor\dfrac{n-1}{525,600}\bigg\rfloor + 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2014 = \bigg\lfloor\dfrac{n-1}{525,600}\bigg\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2014 = \dfrac{n-1}{525,600}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2014\times525,600 = n - 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,058,588,400 = n - 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n = 1,058,588,401"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We need at least "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,058,588,401"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" people to be sure. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Therefore, the only capable country for the situation is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{China}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Yes, and also as 2015 is the current year, the number of people required also depends on which day the question is being asked.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            The estimated population tells the number of people "},{"type":"text","text":"alive","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" in 2015, not only people "},{"type":"text","text":"born","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" in 2015. Assuming a generous bound of at most 10% people born in any given year, even China isn't enough (only 130 million people compared to the 1 billion necessary)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"However, China is still the correct answer, if only because it has the most population and hence the highest probability of succeeding.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 2015 and Fibonacci
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/e0f6803377.1574bddb75.3l0lUT.jpg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dots"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{2014}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be real numbers and also let "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x) = \begin{cases}x + a_1 & & x \le 1 \\ 2x + a_2 & & 1 < x \le 2 \\ 3x + 2a_3 & & 2 < x \le 3 \\ \quad \cdots & & \quad \cdots \\ 2014x + F_{2014}a_{2014} & & 2013 < x \le 2014 \\2015x + F_{2015}a_{2015} & & 2014 < x \le 2015 \\ 2016x + F_{2016}a_{1} & & x > 2015  \end{cases} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"F_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"th "},{"type":"text","text":"Fibonacci number","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f\left( x \right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is continuous everywhere, then the maximum value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1 + a_2 + a_3 + \dots + a_{2014} + a_{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can be expressed as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-\dfrac { \alpha  }{ F_\beta  - F_\gamma - 1 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\alpha"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\beta"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gamma"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive integers. Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\alpha + \beta + \gamma"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Please show your solutions,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Image credit: Flickr Jean"}]}]}

title: 2015 and square root madness
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a, b, c, d, m, n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be positive integers.
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a, c, n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the least possible.
If
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{2015-a}=b"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{a+c}=d"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{a + b + c +  d + 1} = m\sqrt{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m + n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This question doesn't have any trick with equation system, you can just solve it one-by-one."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015-a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be a perfect square.
The condition that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the least possible shows that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015-a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the "},{"type":"text","text":"maximum","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" perfect square possible that is "},{"type":"text","text":"less","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" than "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"44^{2} = 1936"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"45^{2} = 2025"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we now know that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015-a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the square of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"44."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015 - a = 44^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sqrt{2015 - a} = \sqrt{44^{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sqrt{2015 - a} = 44   \cdots   \star "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015 - a = 1936"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 2015 - 1936"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
From above, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 79"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\star"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b = 44"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Using the almost similar trick to the second equation."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+c=79+c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be a perfect square.
The condition that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the least possible shows that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"79+c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the "},{"type":"text","text":"minimum","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" perfect square possible that is "},{"type":"text","text":"more","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" than "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"79"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8^{2} = 64"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{2} = 81"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we now know that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"79+c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the square of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"79+c = 9^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sqrt{79+c} = \sqrt{9^{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sqrt{79+c} = 9   \cdots   \star "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"79+c = 81"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 81-79"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
From above, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\star"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d = 9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now, to the last equation, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{a+b+c+d+1} = m\sqrt{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Putting everything together we will get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{79 + 44 +2 + 9 + 1} = \sqrt{135} = m\sqrt{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the least positive integer possible, then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" cannot have common primes.
Using prime factorization to get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"135 = 3^{3} \times 5 = 3^{2} \times 3 \times 5 = 3^{2} \times 15"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{135} = \sqrt{3^{2} \times 15} = 3\sqrt{15}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At last, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m + n = 3 + 15 = \boxed{18}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
